name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary oil is known for its stimulating properties and is often used for mental clarity.

name: Lemon
description: Lemon oil has uplifting properties and is often used to boost mood and energy.

name: Ylang Ylang
description: Ylang Ylang oil is known for its ability to calm the mind and promote relaxation.

name: Clary Sage
